testcase.name: Create and verify users table
testcase.system-out: Given the database connection is established................................passed When I create a users table.................................................passed Then the users table should exist...........................................passed

testcase.name: Insert and retrieve a user
testcase.system-out: Given the database connection is established................................passed Given I create a users table................................................passed When I insert a user with id 1, name "John Doe", and email "john@example.com".passed Then I should be able to retrieve user with id 1............................passed And the user name should be "John Doe"......................................passed And the user email should be "john@example.com".............................passed

testcase.name: Insert multiple users and count
testcase.system-out: Given the database connection is established................................passed Given I create a users table................................................passed When I insert the following users:..........................................passed Then the users table should have 3 records..................................passed

testcase.name: Update user information
testcase.system-out: Given the database connection is established................................passed Given I create a users table................................................passed And I insert a user with id 1, name "John Doe", and email "john@example.com".passed When I update user with id 1 to have email "john.updated@example.com".......passed Then the user with id 1 should have email "john.updated@example.com"........passed

testcase.name: Delete a user
testcase.system-out: Given the database connection is established................................passed Given I create a users table................................................passed And I insert a user with id 1, name "John Doe", and email "john@example.com".passed When I delete user with id 1................................................passed Then the user with id 1 should not exist....................................passed

testcase.name: Query users by email domain
testcase.system-out: Given the database connection is established................................passed Given I create a users table................................................passed And I insert the following users:...........................................passed When I query users with email domain "example.com"..........................passed Then I should get 2 users...................................................passed

testcase.name: Attempt to insert duplicate user ID
testcase.system-out: Given the database connection is established................................passed Given I create a users table................................................passed And I insert a user with id 1, name "John Doe", and email "john@example.com".passed When I attempt to insert a user with id 1, name "Jane Doe", and email "jane@example.com".passed Then a duplicate key exception should be thrown.............................passed
